== About me ==

My real name is Rodrigo Rodríguez (yes, sounds redundant but <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patronymic|it's not]]</nowiki>). I'm from Carazo, Nicaragua, but raised in the capital city, Managua.

I'm member of the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.org.ni/|Nicaraguan Ubuntu LoCo Team]]</nowiki> since 2008, but I use Ubuntu since Feisty Fawn (2007).

=== Outside the community ===

I studied Sociology and Social communication at the <nowiki>[[http://www.uca.edu.ni| Central American University]]</nowiki>.

I'm currently working at <nowiki>[[http://www.confidencial.com.ni|Confidencial]]</nowiki>, as a digital journalist.

I'm also co-founder of the <nowiki>[[http://www.revistacalachero.com|Cultural Digital Magazine Calachero]]</nowiki>.
